alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 11:49PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Grant County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking outflow winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Boscobel to near Fennimore to near Sherrill. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Platteville, Lancaster, Boscobel, Fennimore, Cuba City, Muscoda, Dickeyville, Preston, Georgetown, Arthur, Montfort, Potosi, Livingston, Centerville, Orion, Mount Ida, Ellenboro, Tennyson, Union and Highway 61 And County T. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Wisconsin.
